text:
Producer-san,
Can I ask you something?
Ah, you want to see how the photos turned out, right?

...Oh, this one looks nice.
You're waving your hand.
Wow, I actually really like that one too.

But you know, it's a bit unusual to see Chiyuki taking a selfie.
It's kinda... hehe.

Hehe, actually, Amana-chan taught me
how to take good selfies.

She said, "On the day of the festival, we're gonna take super
cute ones! So Chiyuki-san, make sure to learn the tricks too!"

Tenka-chan also taught me how to handle guns...
I have to do my best at the shooting gallery too!
It seems like Chiyuki will be quite active.
I'll make sure to capture the best moments
